title: Break down how to use ChatGPT with this $17 training course
content:

Through April 2, lifetime access to this immersive ChatGPT education is only $16.97 (reg. $80).

Featuring 25 hours of content, this course created by International Open Academy is your fast track to understanding everything ChatGPT can do in a straightforward overview. Whether it’s for content creation, simple note-taking and drafting, or for fun, this comprehensive primer guides users in just the right prompts and techniques for creating just the content you need.

While lesser AI projects can tackle simpler tasks like basic copywriting, this training explores the robust nature of the ChatGPT platform and its versatility for creating everything from simple blog content to more involved essays and full reports on thousands of different subjects. 

The course even outlines the seven areas where AI can improve your current skills, from content creation and market research to data analytics, lead generation, and beyond.

Utilize ChatGPT effectively to support your personal and professional needs when you grab this Introduction to ChatGPT course for just $16.97, the best price online. Offer ends April 2 at 11:59 PM Pacific.
